input_code: export function add(a: number, b: number) { return a + b; }
target_tests:
import { add } from './add';
describe('add', () => { it('adds numbers', () => { expect(add(2, 3)).toBe(5); }); });

import { isEven } from './isEven';
describe('isEven', () => { it('detects evens', () => { expect(isEven(4)).toBe(true); }); it('detects odds', () => { expect(isEven(5)).toBe(false); }); });
